events.name: Jacksonville Jaguars at Las Vegas Raiders

venue.fullName: Tom Benson Hall of Fame Stadium

headlines.description: — The Las Vegas Raiders gave coach Josh McDaniels a successful homecoming in his debut on their sideline.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raiders give McDaniels happy homecoming, beat Jaguars 27-11

video.headline: Stidham scampers into end zone for 12-yard TD run
